00019 #ifndef _ALCHEMY_COND_H
00020 #define _ALCHEMY_COND_H
00021 
00022 #include <copperplate/cluster.h>
00023 #include <alchemy/cond.h>
00024 
00025 struct threadobj;
00026 
00027 struct alchemy_cond {
00028         unsigned int magic;     /* Must be first. */
00029         char name[32];
00030         pthread_cond_t cond;
00031         struct clusterobj cobj;
00032 };
00033 
00034 #define cond_magic      0x8686ebeb
00035 
00036 extern struct syncluster alchemy_cond_table;
00037 
00038 #endif /* _ALCHEMY_COND_H */
